text: Ezɨ Naman kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Beghiar vamɨra markɨ, nɨ pumuning inigh.” A mɨghɨghavɨra da iniasa Gehasi mɨgei, ezɨ Gehasi da iniasa ifonge. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Naman beghiar pumuning isa silvan avɨriba aning gaghui, silvan kabar dɨbobonim, 60,000 kinan tu. Egha uaghan korotiar aghuir pumuning ini, egha bizir kaba inigha uan ingangarir gumazimning ganɨngi, ezɨ aning da atera Gehasin faragha zui.
